about_the_game:
The Demon Subduing Wizard is a card building game that combines character character and Roguelike playing method. Players encounter a series of demons and ghosts in an unpredictable world, which can be used to drive away demons, fight against the strong and help the weak, or escape. Players can choose various strategies in the face of demons and ghosts. Each choice will change their character, and with the change of character, the people and things they encounter will also change.

In this world, you want to play the role of a powerful killer, a merciful and kind person, an aloof rebel, or a just and orderly person. Each choice you make will reshape your personality. As your personality changes, it will not only affect card acquisition, but also affect adventure events;

Game features

Build your character

By starting with the innate qualification, each monster choice will change your character composition. A good character composition can often accelerate your card deck composition;

Designated character test

When your character grows to a certain value, you will encounter character tests at different stages. You can choose to give up the test or accept the test. If you can pass the test, you will get unprecedented growth;


By constantly improving your character composition, accelerating the construction of the deck, constantly practicing, and constantly choosing, you can decide which cards to join your deck, and ultimately form the ultimate deck to play the perfect routine flow;

After peeking at the characteristics of monsters, you will be completely immersed in the fun of card combination and card playing;

Characteristic Monster

In this unpredictable world, you will encounter all kinds of ghosts and goblins, all kinds of charm, curse, cure, shackle, and all kinds of abilities of living together. It is also a part of strength to fully understand the characteristics of monsters and consider the licensing strategy and the opportunity to use pills according to the characteristics of monsters.


An unpredictable world

Every time you enter this mysterious world, your route changes. Do you want to avoid demons and move forward cautiously, or do you want to kill them all the way? Facing different enemies, different adventures, how to choose the way forward is also a knowledge;


Combination of various genres

There are hundreds of cards, dozens of magic weapons can be combined to create different schools. You can choose either the burning stream of great opening and closing, or the infinite divine calculation stream of wisdom. There is always one of N schools that you like;


Each reincarnation in "Demon Subduing Heavenly Master" not only enables you to learn to grow, but also gradually exposes the story that the human heart is more dangerous than the ghost. Each time you play, you will encounter different demons, adventures and event combinations. Whether fate is determined by heaven or man can win depends on your one thought.
